lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S., British, Japanese and Swiss investors often preferred to execute block trades -- 50,000 shares and up -- with City market makers who could absorb at least some of the paper in their own positions, diminishing the immediate impact on the share price.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the weakening attraction of "Financial Centre Germany" was unlikely to deter major Japanese banks from setting up full subsidiaries when the Bundesbank gives the green light for mark eurobond lead management probably around third quarter 1987.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although other national regulatory authorities are known to be considering similar steps in light of growing securitisation of debt previously in the balance sheet, Germany, with its tradition of prudence, may be the first.

lst.name: sentence
